title: Interpretation of seeing Umrah in a dream by Ibn Sirin and what it indicates

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Umrah in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Performing Umrah is one of the good visions that indicate righteousness, piety, and longevity. It also indicates the girl's marriage, the dreamer's generosity, and abundant livelihood. News.Interpretation of the dream of going for Umrah with the family.Interpretation of the dream of going for Umrah with the family in a dream is evidence of the existence of strong ties and many good relationships. It also indicates the collapse of problems and disputes. This vision also indicates the death of anxiety, sadness, and a strong relationship between family members.Interpretation of the dream of preparing to go For Umrah: Seeing preparations to perform Umrah in a young man’s dream indicates righteousness, piety, and the achievement of many achievements in his life, and seeing the performance of rituals such as tawaf and running between Safa and Marwa means that he achieves what he wants and avoids sins and transgressions. Umrah rituals for the dreamer, whether male or female, are among the most beneficial visions for a person. It means progress and excellence in life in general. It also means the provision of a good husband or a good wife for an unmarried young man and an unmarried girl, as this vision indicates wealth and affluence. Interpretation of a dream about going for Umrah and not performing Umrah. Whoever sees that he went for Umrah and did not perform Umrah, this is evidence of his backwardness in the right of God and the acts of worship that belong to Him, and also a sign of His departure from God and the truth. Way. Whoever sees that he went for Umrah and did not perform Umrah, this is a warning to the pioneer and he must reverse the mistakes he is committing. Interpretation of a dream about going for Umrah for a married woman. Seeing Umrah in a married woman’s dream means an abundance of kindness and abundance for her and her family members, which will make her life easier and the fulfillment of a wish in her life. Umrah in a married woman’s dream is good news of pregnancy, and she will be happy with this baby. And if she sees that her husband will perform Umrah, this indicates that her husband will get a new job opportunity or a promotion at work and get a reward, or enter into an investment scheme and succeed in that project. Interpretation of a dream The intention of going for Umrah for a pregnant woman: If a woman is suffering from problems with her husband and family and sees that she is going to perform Umrah, this means that these problems will be solved, God willing, and she will find blessings and peace at home, and the problems will end and almost disappear. Currently. Seeing a pregnant woman performing Umrah is evidence of the imminence of childbirth, and the ease of childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about preparing for Umrah for a married woman: Seeing someone preparing to perform Umrah and performing its rituals in a dream means that there is a lot of goodness that he will bring, and seeing preparations for Umrah in a married woman’s dream indicates circumstances Goodness, peace of mind, comfort, and marital stability. Seeing preparations for performing Umrah indicates feeding good offspring. Intention to go to Umrah in a dream. Seeing the dreamer that he intends to go for Umrah and seeing that in a dream, the method of performing Umrah indicates repentance from sin and many good deeds. Umrah in a dream is evidence. However, the dreamer is blessed with a long life, good health, justice, piety, and good news for the pioneer. The symbol of Umrah in a dream. Seeing Umrah in a dream means a long life for the pioneer, good health and bliss for the pioneer, as well as sustenance and abundant money. If one sees that

title: Interpretation of dreams for a king to see an unmarried woman

preview.html: Not only the girl, but also heralds those who love you with the king with many happy things, in addition to some simple visions that will explain to you in this article, so follow us. Interpretation of dreams for the king to see an unmarried woman If the unmarried girl sees in a dream the king sending her flowers. This is evidence that she will marry a person with strength and a strong personality. And at the moment she saw herself bowing before the king. It is an expression of her feeling of sadness, and it also shows that she will be psychologically broken. When the girl sees in a dream that an angel is placing a crown on her head. It is evidence that she will soon be promoted to her position. It can also indicate that she will marry someone soon. An unmarried girl when she sees an angel smiling at her in her sleep. It is evidence that he will enjoy nobility and that he will have many good things in the coming period. Seeing a single girl, the king, in a dream is evidence that he will have many good things. It may also indicate that he is actually exposed to an illness, but he recovers from it, and God knows best. Some scholars believe that seeing the king for an unmarried girl. Expression that she will triumph over her enemies who want to harm her. It can also It indicates that she is being subjected to severe injustice by many and that she is in dire need of someone to stand by her and support her. There are those who see in the girl’s vision of the king an expression of her seizing prestige. When the girl sees herself sitting in the king’s dialogue, this is evidence that she will be able to achieve the goals she seeks. The unmarried vision of the king is considered one of the good and praiseworthy visions that warn the owner of the dream of kindness and blessing. The vision of an unmarried girl, the king, can express the imminent date of her marriage to a person with good qualities. It may also express his vision that he will have good news for her soon. And that she will be able to achieve all her goals that she thought were difficult to achieve. Interpretation of a dream of seeing the king for a married woman A married woman when she sees the king in a dream. This is evidence that you will face many problems and crises in the coming period. Seeing a married woman of the king in a dream and she is an employee is an expression of her promotion at work. This vision also indicates that this woman’s husband will be promoted at work and that he will receive great good. And this dream, if a woman who has not yet given birth sees it, is evidence that she will give birth soon, God knows best. But when a married woman sees In a dream, an angel looks at her with a sharp look and gets angry. This proves her serious neglect of the rights of her children and her husband. Seeing a king as a married woman may mean that she is a woman with good qualities. There is another interpretation of this vision, which is that he is neglecting the right of God Almighty and obeying Him. He is the closest to the Lord, prayer and seeking guidance. We have chosen for you: I dreamed that I was collecting gold from the ground Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who sees the king in a dream. This may indicate that she will give birth to a child who will be of great value in the future. If a pregnant woman sees that there is a king in a dream, he gives her a valuable gift. Expression

title: Interpretation of falling into a trap in a dream The meaning of falling into a trap in a dream

preview.html: Dream of a siege of a single girl, married, pregnant, divorced, maze, seeing someone besieging me in a corner on a closed street, in a house in a room by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the siege in a dream The siege in a dream indicates waiting and stability in matters and may indicate victory over the polytheists and their control and destruction. The dream: You may dream that you are besieged or that you have fallen into a trap that you cannot get out of with a feeling of extreme anxiety. Meaning: Expresses anxiety whether in personal relationships, health or at work. This is usually dreamed of by a person who suffers from the hardships of daily life as if he is trapped in it. Interpretation of the besieged in a dream If you feel that you are trapped in your dream, this means that you are suffering in daily life from losing something and some confusing things. It can indicate poor health or poor living conditions. Try after dreaming that you are besieged so that you do not feel hopeless, all you have to do is take a close look at things in your life and think about what you can do to change and solve some difficult things. Al-Nabulsi believes that the siege in a dream indicates waiting and stability in matters and may indicate victory over enemies. Interpretation of falling in a dream according to Khalil bin Shaheen Al-Dhahiri: Whoever sees that he entered a place and besieged himself, this indicates his safety from the harm of enemies. Whoever sees that he got out of the siege in which he was present announces that his worries will go away. Interpretation of the besieged in a dream Whoever sees that he entered the siege is safe from the evil of the enemy. If he sees that he has gotten out of the siege, the enemy will triumph over him. Whoever dreams: that he got out of the siege and did not find anyone to bother him, he is praiseworthy, and if he finds comfort and comfort, he is not praiseworthy. Whoever dreams: that he lacks something from the machines and does not find it, this is a deficiency in his ability, and if he finds it, his matter has been done, whether he is besieged or besieged. Interpretation of a dream stuck in a dream - YouTube

Al-Nabulsi believes that the siege in A dream indicates waiting and stability in matters, and it may indicate victory over enemies. Interpretation of falling in a dream according to Khalil bin Shaheen Al-Dhahiri: And whoever sees that he entered a place and besieged himself, this indicates his safety from the harm of enemies. And whoever sees that he escaped from the siege in which he was present. He announces that his worries will go away. Interpretation of being besieged in a dream: Whoever sees that he has entered the siege, then he is safe from the evil of the enemy, and if he sees that he has come out of the siege, then the enemy will triumph over him. And whoever dreams: that he has come out of the siege and does not find anyone harassing him, then he is praiseworthy, and if he finds rest and comfort, then he is It is not Mahmoud. And whoever dreams: that he is missing some of the machines and cannot find them, then this is a deficiency in his ability, and if he finds them, then his command has been completed, whether he is besieged or besieged. title: Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream, as it indicates longevity, and increasing the length of hair can indicate anxiety and sadness, and long hair in a dream is one of the visions that make its owner feel fear and anxiety about this dream and makes him look for an explanation for this vision, as long hair indicates piety and abundance. Money, good news and status. Therefore, we will list the most important interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream. Follow us. Seeing long hair by Ibn Sirin: In Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing long hair in a dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money and a lot of livelihood. Although this person has good morals and is known for his good morals. This indicates that this person He enjoys great prestige and prestige among those around him. What if a person who has a lot of money sees that his hair is long in a dream? This indicates that this money will increase and that he will achieve many projects and goals that he seeks to achieve. The poor man who dreams of long hair. This indicates that this person will become impoverished. And he will commit many sins and disobedience. Seeing long hair for a single person. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she has long hair, this indicates that this girl. A suitable man will propose to her soon and her wedding date is approaching. Also, if an unmarried girl sees that she has long hair in a dream, This indicates that this girl is suffering in reality. A lot of difficulties and worries and that these worries will go away and she will live a happy life without problems and fears. Seeing the long hair of a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she has long hair, this means that this woman has long hair. She will soon be available to her husband. The opportunity to travel, and the travel time will be as long as this woman’s hair. If a married woman sees in a dream that her hair is long but very black, this indicates that this woman is her husband who loves her very much. He is loyal to her, but if her hair is white, this indicates that this woman She will fail in her marriage and consummation will not be consummated. Seeing the long hair of a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that her hair is long, this means that this woman will remain away from her husband for a long time. If the hair is white, this indicates that she will face many problems and difficulties in her life. If the woman’s hair is in a dream Long and soft, this indicates that this woman’s birth will be smooth and easy. Seeing long hair for divorced women. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she has long hair, this means that this woman will live a happy and dignified life and that God Almighty will compensate her for the sad life she was living. If she dreams that Her husband combs her hair, which indicates that she will reconcile with her husband and live a happy life with him. Seeing long hair for a single woman: Seeing long hair in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates wealth, wealth, and a good state of her status. Long, straight hair also indicates the ease of her affairs and the fulfillment of her dreams and desires. Seeing thick hair in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that she will obtain abundant money

title: Interpretation of seeing a snail in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a snail in a dream in detail Seeing a snail becomes a praiseworthy opinion, so many would like to know all the information related to this topic. Snail shell in a dreamSnail shells in a dream indicate joy, happiness, and compensation, and in a sad person’s dream it almost indicates comfort. Collecting snail shells in a dream It indicates that the dreamer will work on a project and benefit greatly from it. Collecting snails in a dream If one sees in a dream that he is collecting snails, this indicates a lot of money and successive successes that the dreamer will achieve. Interpretation of seeing a snail shell in a dream: The vision indicates that the dreamer will obtain what he desires. This vision also indicates that the dreamer has a person near him who is characterized by a difficult and harmful disposition. This vision also shows that the dreamer deals with ease in his life and flexibility in participation.Different meanings and meanings of seeing a snail in a dreamDifferent meanings and meanings of seeing a snail in a dream, let’s get to know them now. Followed: Seeing a snail in a dream indicates many changes in the dreamer’s life, whether for the better or for the worse. Seeing yourself cooking snails in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is exposed to major problems from family or friends. A live snail in a dream indicates happiness, joy, and success in life. Study. If a sick person sees snail shells in a dream, this is evidence that he will recover soon. Seeing the death of a snail in a dream means peace and happiness. If a married woman sees that she is collecting snails in a dream, this is evidence of the blessing of money and pregnancy after exhaustion. The most important interpretations of seeing a snail in a dream. Interpretations of seeing a snail in a dream: An unmarried girl who sees a snail in a dream is evidence of the arrival of good news for her family and perhaps happiness and stability with her partner. The death of a snail in a dream is evidence of joy. If a married woman sees a dead snail in a dream, this means that she will become pregnant soon. Pregnant woman, this is evidence of stability. Seeing a snail without a shell in a dream is evidence of a secret in the fortuneteller’s life, which will be revealed soon. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a snail without a shell in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a snail without a shell in a dream. There are some different interpretations that we should know now: And this vision indicates a great loss. The Lord will suffer from it in his work, especially if the fortuneteller is a merchant. This vision also indicates the many problems and crises that the dreamer faces in his life. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream a snail without a shell, this warns her of the scandal that she will be exposed to. If a pregnant woman sees this Seeing, then its secrets will be revealed soon. In general, seeing a snail without a shell is evidence of evil, revealing the fortuneteller’s secrets, and a big scandal. Interpretation of seeing many snails in a dream. Interpretation of seeing many snails in a dream. Seeing many snails in a dream indicates great profit, gains, and goodness coming to the pioneer. You deal with good people and earn money with them, and God knows best. Now we have finished this article and learned an explanation

title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover them in a dream

preview.html: Exposed clothes in a dream Interpretation of seeing being naked and wearing revealing clothes in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates an inability to adapt. Likewise, whoever sees himself naked in front of some people in a dream and feels ashamed, this means that he will suffer a financial loss. Also, seeing clothes that do not cover In a dream, it indicates the weakness of the viewer in front of others and is a sign of discomfort and stability. When a person sees himself naked in front of people in a dream, this means that he will expose himself in front of people and reveal his romantic relationship. Seeing people naked and looking at the body of the dreamer is considered a dream, as it is one of the unseen visions. Pleasant and indicates the divorce of the wife and death. Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover one woman. The interpretation of seeing a single woman naked in a dream is evidence that God will give her a good husband and make her happy in this world. Also, seeing a girl naked in front of people in a dream indicates that the doors of kindness And nourishment will open up for her in her life. Whoever sees herself completely naked in front of people in a dream is a sign that a misfortune will befall her, God forbid. Also, if a girl sees herself naked in front of her brother in a dream, this is a sign of anxiety, sadness, and extreme sadness. Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes Which does not cover a married woman. Interpretation scholars have interpreted that a married woman who sees herself naked in a dream indicates that a calamity will befall her. The naked person was also mentioned in a woman’s dream, indicating that it indicates marital problems and divorce from the husband, and an indication of death and separation. Seeing The same woman naked in front of people in a dream indicates many difficulties and fears that she will go through. Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover the pregnant woman. The interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman wearing tight clothes in a dream is evidence that she feels tired and has problems with pregnancy and childbirth. To dream of the same woman stripping Her clothing in front of her husband means that she will give birth soon and that God will give her goodness. Also, seeing naked in front of people in a dream shows that a pregnant woman is one of the unpleasant visions and a sign of misfortunes. Interpretation of wearing short clothesInterpretation of seeing wearing short clothes in a dream indicates a difficult and sad life and entering A stage full of difficulties. Seeing a man wearing women's clothing in a dream is a sign of misfortunes and disasters that will befall him. title: Interpretation of a dream about cucumbers for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cucumber in a dream for a single woman and various other situations, one of the favorite vegetables. Cucumber has many uses. It can be chopped with other vegetables and served as a salad. It can be eaten as a type of appetizer alongside food, and there are many benefits, but seeing cucumbers in a dream can have many rumors and interpretations, and here are more details in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about cucumbers in a dream: Interpretation of cucumbers in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great world sees Ibn Sirin said that seeing cucumbers in a dream is a sign of sadness and sorrow that may befall the dreamer, God forbid. - The chapter is a warning to the Lord against illness and sadness, God forbid. Interpretation of cucumbers in a dream by Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi agrees with Ibn Sirin that seeing cucumbers in a dream can be a sign of illness and sadness, and he says that whoever dreams of eating cucumbers is trying to achieve something and will not achieve it. Interpretation of cucumbers in A dream by Ibn Shaheen: And in the hadith of Ibn Shaheen: Whoever finds cucumbers in their season, and their color is intense green, and they contain moisture and vitality, then he will hear the best speeches. As for the one who eats cucumbers in a dream, he suffers from many problems and fears, God willing. Whoever sees the color of the cucumbers yellow in the dream is an indication of the effort that the fortuneteller will make to achieve success. Interpretation of cucumbers in a dream for a single woman: Cucumbers are generally considered a sign of nutrition, so if An unmarried woman sees green cucumbers with wonderful taste, this is good news for her, but if the cucumbers are yellow, then she is exposed to a lot of fatigue and illness. If an unmarried woman sees pickled cucumbers in a dream, this is a sign that she will face a problem because of those around her speaking ill of her. In the event that she An unmarried woman cutting a cucumber into pieces and falling ill, her vision is good news for her recovery, God willing. Interpretation of a fresh cucumber in a dream for a single woman: A fresh green cucumber in a dream is good news about the death of worries and sorrows, no matter how large and numerous they are, in addition to achieving happiness, tranquility and enjoying life. Calm, full of positive energy. Interpretation of choosing cucumbers in a dream for a single woman: If the dreamer finds himself choosing cucumbers in a dream, this vision is a sign that he can do a lot of work together to reach the standard of living he hopes for. Interpretation of cucumber seeds in a dream for a single woman: Seeing cucumber seeds promises increased profit, doubled goodness, and living for the sole pioneer. Interpretation of a cucumber farm in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a cucumber farm in anyone’s dream means that she will attend celebrations and happy occasions, so the vision may be good news for her marriage soon, but if the unmarried woman sits in A farm, she will have a stable and quiet marital home that will be more beautiful than all the homes her eyes have seen. Interpretation of cucumber in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is drinking cucumber juice, then seeing it is a sign that she enjoys vitality, health, and activity. But if she sees that she is eating green cucumber with good taste He will have a lot of strength,

title: Interpretation of a dream to see kind words in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing kind words in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing kind words in a dream indicates a person’s happiness, strength, and a lot of money. Likewise, seeing kind words in a dream indicates the dreamer’s devotion to his god and the good deeds that he will do in his next life. Also, seeing kind words in a dream indicates the dreamer’s devotion to his goddess and the good deeds that he will do in his next life. Good words in a dream indicate a lot of sustenance, an abundance of money, and repentance to Almighty God and a return to Him. Interpretation of seeing good words in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is speaking kind words and gentle words, this indicates her close marriage to a good man. Also, seeing kind words in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the end of her problems and her excellence in study and life, and God knows best. Also, seeing kind words indicates that the girl will enter into a new relationship and continue in a good and blessed marriage, God willing. Seeing kind words from an unknown person indicates that That the single girl was deceived and exposed to negative thoughts and issues, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing kind words in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream someone speaking to her with kind words, this indicates the collapse of the differences between her and her husband. Also, seeing her marriage speaking to her with words that enter the heart and explain The soul, this indicates her intense love for her husband and her obedience to his commands. Also, seeing kind words indicates achieving the married woman’s goals that she seeks and in order to communicate with her, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing kind words in a dream about a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that someone is speaking With kind words to her, this means that her affairs will be facilitated and her birth will be easy. This vision also indicates that the date of her birth will be set and the pain of childbirth will go away, and it indicates that she will be blessed with good offspring, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing kind words in a dream about a man. If a man dreams that she is addressing him To his wife with good words, this indicates abundant food and money from which they do not count. Also, seeing a good conversation for a single person indicates his marriage to a good and sincere girl who suits him, and God knows best. Also, seeing a good conversation indicates the disappearance of the dreamer’s worries and problems, and his transition to a new job, And his blessings are abundant money, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about public debate. If one dreams that he is speaking to a crowd, this indicates the dreamer’s good circumstances and hard work, and God knows best. Also, seeing a conversation with an audience in a dream indicates a bachelor’s marriage, his advancement, his high status, and his great relationship. If you have If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing grass in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing grass in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and seeing eating grass in a dream indicates the wealth of the poor, and seeing grass means doubling money and profit in trade. And the interpretation of dreaming of green grass in a dream, according to the most prominent Arab translators and scholars, most people see green grass in their daily lives And gardens, which are one of the wonderful landscapes that attract with the charm and beauty of a place, but have you ever dreamed of seeing green grass? What is the meaning of this dream, what is the correct interpretation of the dream of green grass, and is this dream bad or good? We will address all of these questions through the interpretation of a dream to see green grass in a dream, the interpretation of a dream to see grass in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about green grass according to Al-Nabulsi. Whoever dreams that he is eating grass or as if he is holding in his hand and taking grass from the ground to eat, this is wealth for the poor. But if The person with insight has a lot of money and sees that he is eating grass in a dream, then his money will double. Whoever sees in a dream that hemp or hashish was removed from his skin and came out of his hands or grew in his hands, this indicates the death of its owner. Seeing a lot of grass in a dream, and people They carry a lot of grass in their hands. The vision indicates the abundance of goodness, blessing and livelihood in this year’s crops and in the same place. Likewise, whoever sees in a dream weeds, plants, and other plants in a place and this place does not normally grow, such as planting grass inside a mosque or mosque, or the growth of beneficial plants and herbs. In the middle of the house and in the house, the vision shows goodness in the mosque and goodness in the house. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing spinach in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq & # 8211; My magazine: Interpretation of a dream about seeing grass by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin left from seeing green grass in a dream. It is a welcome dream, which in turn indicates happiness and peace of mind. Seeing a dreamer walking on soft grass in this dream indicates the removal of obstacles or difficulties. As for the dreamer who sees himself sleeping On green grass, this is evidence of a life of asceticism and kindness. Sitting on green grass is evidence of a great blessing. Seeing the harvest and collecting green grass in a dream is a testimony to a righteous woman in this world. As for the dreamer who sees that the green grass has burned in a dream, there is evidence of That the people around him want to harm him. Seeing green grass planted in this garden indicates that the dreamer has undertaken many successful tasks in his life. While seeing the raging green grass in the dream indicates the livelihood that the student will earn from trade, industry, and crafts. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq & # 8211; My Magazine: Interpretation of a dream about eating green grass: A patient who sees that he is eating green grass in a dream indicates that this has cured him of his illness. Seeing him eating green grass also indicates that this person is convinced that he is satisfied with a little of his life and does not desire anything. Seeing wealthy people eating this Green grass is a warning to him that he will face serious financial problems

title: Interpretation of seeing spoiled fesikh in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing spoiled fesikh in a dream. Seeing fesikh in a dream is considered one of the dreams and visions that come to the mind of many people in a dream according to the details. Interpretation of seeing spoiled fesikh in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing spoiled fesikh in a dream has many indications and signs, and one of the leading interpreters Ibn Sirin who said that the interpretation of this dream indicates the following indications: The interpretation of a dream about eating fescue in a dream indicates the possibility of hearing good news. The dream can be interpreted as carrying many fears and sorrows that the dreamer may be exposed to. The interpretation of seeing one eating in general came in The dream is an indication of the bad psychological state that the dreamer is suffering from. It is possible that the dream of buying feseekh in a dream carries the meaning of a major disaster that the fortuneteller may fall into. Finally, Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of selling feseekh in a dream as a sign of solving problems and overcoming crises, obstacles and challenges. Which God may face. Interpretation of the dream of Fesikh in a dream by Ibn Sirin. As we explained previously, seeing Fesikh in a dream by Ibn Shirin indicates the possibility of hearing good news that the dreamer may hear, and it is one of the good dreams that people like to associate with because it indicates abundance of sustenance and good food. It means that He fulfills his desires and eating it shows a bad mentality. The interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning fesikh in a dream. The interpretation of seeing eating fesikh or abstaining from it in a dream is completely different from cleaning it. Cleaning the physique in a dream has several connotations, as follows: A dream of seeing someone cleaning the physique in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will overcome many marital problems and conflicts. It is also possible to suggest that God facilitated the process of her birth. If the man sees himself cleaning the physique In a dream, it means that he has paid off his debts. The dream of fesikh in a single girl’s dream indicates that she will move on to a new life. Interpretation of seeing eating fesikh in a dream for a pregnant woman. The dream of eating fesikh in a pregnant woman’s dream shows many clues and may portend unpleasant news, including These are the following signs: If a pregnant woman dreams that she is eating fesikh, this indicates the difficulty of giving birth. If a pregnant woman feeds fesikh to a small child, this indicates the death of her fetus. If a pregnant woman dreams of fesikh without eating it, this bodes well. If he sells fesikh, this indicates On bad conditions. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is cleaning fisik before eating, this indicates that she will give birth easily. Interpretation of a dream of fisik for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about fisik for an unmarried woman can indicate a group of hints and signals that interpretation scholars have come up with, including The following signs and signals: If a single woman sees a broken heart in her dream, this means a signal and warning from someone close to her and that they have an emotional relationship that will cause her a lot of sadness and pain. If a single woman buys a vesik in her dream, this means that she will face many problems and conflicts with the family And friends may feel
